name: Phosphorescent Llama
body:
## Projects

### [Ngtzit](http://www.ngtzit.com)

Ngtzit is an original rhythm game that tests your aural pattern-matching skills in a fun and sexy 70's disco themed synth.

### [Moodlet](http://moodletllama.herokuapp.com)

Moodlet is a serene mood tracking app that encourages mindfulness and uses your input to help you reflect on what really makes you happy.

## Team

* Jordan Olthoff: [linkedIn](), [github](http://github.com/jolthoff)
* Kyle Cho: [linkedIn](), [github](http://github.com/kylecho)
* Naomi Jacobs: [linkedIn](), [github](http://github.com/naomiajacobs)
* Rodrigo Delgado: [linkedIn](), [github](http://github.com/rdalcega)
